sourcesContent:
<template>
  <b-navbar type="dark" variant="dark" fixed="top" class="mb-5">
    <b-navbar-brand href="#">TV Show Dashboard</b-navbar-brand>
    <b-form-input
      v-model="searchQuery"
      @input="updateSearch"
      placeholder="Search shows..."
      class="ml-auto"
    ></b-form-input>
  </b-navbar>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  computed: {
    searchQuery: {
      get() {
        return this.$store.state.searchQuery;
      },
      set(value) {
        this.$store.commit('SET_SEARCH_QUERY', value);
      },
    },
  },
  methods: {
    updateSearch() {
      this.$store.commit('SET_SEARCH_QUERY', this.searchQuery);
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
</style>
